note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). [Non-melanoma skin cancers](#dod:non-melanoma-skin-cancer) are excluded due to potentially incomplete records and inconsistent registry practices.
title: Cancer incidence rate
subtitle: Estimated number of new [cancer](#dod:cancer) cases per 100,000 people, in a given year.
